name: Cashew Chicken
instructions: To roast nuts: fry them in 250ml oil over low heat until nuts are brown, then drain
Put oil in a wok and let heat on medium-high heat
Once garlic is brown, add chicken, onions, red chiles and stir-fry for about 3 minutes
Add stock and stir it in
Add sauce and stir-fry to combine
Add cashew nuts and spring onions and stir-fry briefly
Add wine or whiskey and turn off the heat

additional_context.tips: Since this recipe is quick, make sure all ingredients are prepped and ready before starting to cook.
